transArray.content: Dear guest, thank you for choosing us among many hotels. Thank you very much for your support and trust in our work. Parking is available in the hotel courtyard, and it is very convenient for shopping and delicious food in the surrounding area. The transportation is convenient and can satisfy everything you want. According to demand, the hotel has also added delivery robots, free self-service laundry rooms, and dryers. The breakfast buffet has a complete range of Chinese and Western varieties and tastes very good. I hope you will bring your family to taste it next time you stay.
